title: external storage mounting is very slow with webdav
body:
expected behavior

the external mount (dropbox in my case) should be fast and donâ´t freeze when iâ´m using it trough webdav in windows.

the external storage in oc web interference should be fast and donâ´t take forever to open.

actual behavior

when i try to open my external storage (dropbox) using webdav the system freezes, and hangs itself. also the whole webdav interference gets affected by having an external storage mounted. the system is very slow, and it takes forever to indexing the regular oc folders in the file-system. 

also: when i finally can browse my external storage through webdav itâ´s veeery slow and i often get "system is not responding" by just right-click on on any folder inside the external storage file-system.

and in the oc web interference it takes very long time to even open the external storage. but when i connect with webdav using the remote.php/webdav in my browser everything floats as it should and there it says: "generated by sabredav 1.7.6-stable (c)2007-2013 http://code.google.com/p/sabredav/"

server configuration

operating system: windows 7 ultimate

server: ubuntu server 12.04 lts 

database: mysql

program to mount webdav: netdrive (http://www.netdrive.net/) 

browser: chrome 27.0.1453.116 m

owncloud version: 5.0.8 



anything you could look into @mtgap ?
